name: WiTH && 共在
description:
这个电子游戏没有目标，你可以使用WASD键或者方向键来移动玩家角色，按下Tab键来重置游戏（假如你遇到了什么奇怪的BUG），按下ESC键来退出游戏 This  game has no specific objectives. To navigate the player character, you can use either the WASD keys or the arrow keys. Pressing Tab will reset the game in case you encounter any unexpected bugs, whereas pressing ESC will allow you to exit the game. 请使用耳机！请使用耳机！请使用耳机！ Please use headphone! Please use headphone! Please use headphone! 音效以及音乐是我们游戏体验中不可或缺的核心，请务必使用耳机体验本游戏。 Sound and music is at the very heart of our game's experience, please consider using headphone to play this game.

现代生活中，人与人的关系愈发异化，前有他人是奇迹；后有他人是地狱。我们与他者之间似乎越来越疏离，资本，消费，信息爆炸使得人与人之间建立联系越来越成为一种实际上的困难。人与人，人与物之间的关系不断地被重构和解离。

In modern life, relationships between people seem increasingly alienated. It's a miracle to encounter others, and a hell to be surrounded by them. Capital, consumption, and information explosion make it increasingly difficult to establish connections between people. Relationships between humans and objects are constantly being reconstructed and dissociated. 

存在（being）从来不是自我的单独课题，只有走出自我的界限，生活才由嘈杂的琐碎蜕变为汹涌而充盈的冒险。

Being has never been solely a matter of the self; only by breaking free from our self-imposed limitations can life transform from a noisy, trivial existence into a thrilling and fulfilling adventure.
